articles.title: FDA issues guidance for coronavirus lab tests
articles.description: The guidance comes as at least four people have tested positive for the virus without a known origin.
articles.content:
CDC also recommended testing for health care personnel or others who have been within about six feet of someone with the virus, dubbed Covid-19, for a prolonged period. The new recommendation could greatly ramp up demand for tests.

articles.author: Eli Okun
articles.title: Trump’s new coronavirus risk: Dangerous spin and public distrust — inside Iran
articles.description: If the coronavirus keeps spreading in Iran, the U.S. could face some tough choices after years of trying to isolate the country.
articles.content:
But in Iran, which the Trump administration has successfully isolated from much of the world since pulling out of the Iran nuclear deal, the president has very limited options to engage.
Its been less than two months since the U.S. killed top Iranian general… [+3931 chars]

Then Trump called the coronavirus their new hoax.

articles.title: Biden blasts Trump for calling coronavirus a ‘hoax’
articles.description: "Some of the stuff he says is so bizarre that you can laugh at it,” Biden said to reporters.
